com.wolvencraft.yasp.db

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a running database instance.
    There can only be one instance running at any given time.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void cleanup()
      Cleans up the leftover database and connection instances to prevent memory leaks.
      java.util.List<Query.QueryResult> fetchData(java.lang.String sql)
      Returns the data from the remote server according to the SQL query.
      This is a raw method and should never be used by itself.
      static Database getInstance()
      Returns the current running instance of the database
      static Database getInstance(boolean silent)
      Returns the current running instance of the database
      boolean pushData(java.lang.String sql)
      Pushes data to the remote database.
      This is a raw method and should never be used by itself.
      boolean reconnect()
      Attempts to reconnect to the remote server
      void runCustomPatch(java.lang.String patchId)
      Applies a custom patch to the remote database
      void runPatch(boolean force)
      Patches the remote database to the latest version.
      This method will run in the main server thread and therefore will freeze the server until the patch is complete.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database()
         throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Default constructor. Connects to the remote database, performs patches if necessary, and holds to the DB info.
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown if the plugin could not connect to the database

    • Method Detail

      • runPatch

        public void runPatch(boolean force)
              throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Patches the remote database to the latest version.
        This method will run in the main server thread and therefore will freeze the server until the patch is complete.
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown if the plugin is unable to patch the remote database

      • runCustomPatch

        public void runCustomPatch(java.lang.String patchId)
                    throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Applies a custom patch to the remote database
        Parameters:
        patchId - Unique ID of the desired patch
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown if the plugin is unable to patch the remote database

      • reconnect

        public boolean reconnect()
        Attempts to reconnect to the remote server
        Returns:
        true if the connection was present, or reconnect is successful. false otherwise.

      • pushData

        public boolean pushData(java.lang.String sql)
        Pushes data to the remote database.
        This is a raw method and should never be used by itself. Use the QueryUtils wrapper for more options and proper error handling. This method is not to be used for regular commits to the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query
        Returns:
        true if the sync is successful, false otherwise

      • fetchData

        public java.util.List<Query.QueryResult> fetchData(java.lang.String sql)
        Returns the data from the remote server according to the SQL query.
        This is a raw method and should never be used by itself. Use the QueryUtils wrapper for more options and proper error handling. This method is not to be used for regular commits to the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query
        Returns:
        Data from the remote database

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance()
                            throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Returns the current running instance of the database
        Returns:
        Database instance
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown if there is no active connection to the database

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance(boolean silent)
                            throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Returns the current running instance of the database
        Parameters:
        silent - If true, will not check if a database instance exists.
        Returns:
        Database instance
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown if there is no active connection to the database

      • cleanup

        public static void cleanup()
        Cleans up the leftover database and connection instances to prevent memory leaks.
